text: The LORD1:2 When rendered in ALL CAPITAL LETTERS, “LORD” or “GOD” is the translation of God’s Proper Name. is a jealous God1:2 The Hebrew word rendered “God” is “אֱלֹהִ֑ים” (Elohim). and avenges. The LORD avenges and is full of wrath. The LORD takes vengeance on his adversaries, and he maintains wrath against his enemies.
